languages.text: "Сегодня... первое звено потянет за собой следующие, и вскоре цепь затянется на горле. Но чьем? Нет, не вижу..."
"Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня... первое звено потянет за собой следующие, и вскоре цепь затянется на горле. Но чьем? Нет, не вижу..."

traits.locale_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."
"Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."
"Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."
"Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

languages.text: “今天……第一个链条将会拉动其他链条，这些链条很快就会紧紧地套在某个人的脖子上。但被套住的人是谁？不，我看不到……”
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

traits.locale_text: “今天……第一个链条将会拉动其他链条，这些链条很快就会紧紧地套在某个人的脖子上。但被套住的人是谁？不，我看不到……”

languages.text: «Hoy... el primer eslabón arrastrará a los demás, y pronto la cadena se cerrará en torno a un cuello. Pero ¿el de quién? No, no puedo verlo...».
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy... el primer eslabón arrastrará a los demás, y pronto la cadena se cerrará en torno a un cuello. Pero ¿el de quién? No, no puedo verlo...».

languages.text: 「今日…最初の鎖が他の鎖を引っ張り、やがてそれが首を締め付けるだろう。だが、誰の？いいえ、見えない…」
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

traits.locale_text: 「今日…最初の鎖が他の鎖を引っ張り、やがてそれが首を締め付けるだろう。だが、誰の？いいえ、見えない…」

languages.text: "Heute ... wird das erste Glied die anderen mitziehen, und bald wird sich die Kette um einen Hals straffen. Aber um wessen Hals? Das kann ich nicht sehen ..."
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

traits.locale_text: "Heute ... wird das erste Glied die anderen mitziehen, und bald wird sich die Kette um einen Hals straffen. Aber um wessen Hals? Das kann ich nicht sehen ..."

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui... Le premier maillon attirera les autres à lui, et bientôt la chaîne se resserrera autour d'un cou. Mais le cou de qui ? Je n'arrive pas à voir... »
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui... Le premier maillon attirera les autres à lui, et bientôt la chaîne se resserrera autour d'un cou. Mais le cou de qui ? Je n'arrive pas à voir... »

languages.text: "Bugün, ilk bağlantı yanında diğerlerini de getirecek ve çok yakında boyna dolanmış zincir sıkılaşacak. Ama kimin boynu? Hayır, göremiyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Today... the first link will pull the others along with it, and soon the chain will tighten around a neck. But whose? No, I can't see..."
